name: Amaterasu in the dark
description:
This is my entry to the "Historically Accurate Game Jam 4" game jam.

https://itch.io/jam/historically-accurate-4

Based on Japan Mythology  "Kojiki".

(wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kojiki )

How to play

- mouse control only

- Have fun tapping on the Object to get Amaterasu out of the Heavenly Rock Cave.
